name: DashDice Progress Sync
description: Use https://dash.motioncore.xyz/ to connect your game, sync progress, pair devices, and open levels in Geometry Dash.

server-url.name: Sync Endpoint
server-url.description: URL to POST progress to (for example, https://dash.motioncore.xyz/api/sync/progress).

api-key.name: API Key
api-key.description: Bearer API key generated by your web dashboard.

enable-bridge.name: Enable Local Bridge
enable-bridge.description: Allows DashDice website to talk to this GD client on localhost for Open-In-GD and one-click pairing.

bridge-port.name: Bridge Port
bridge-port.description: Localhost port used by DashDice bridge.

bridge-allowed-origins.name: Allowed Origins
bridge-allowed-origins.description: Comma-separated website origins allowed to call the local bridge.

request-timeout.name: Request Timeout (s)
request-timeout.description: HTTP timeout in seconds for sync requests.
